messages.messageBody:
Holy Crap!
Yeah, I can say that. I almost can't NOT say that. :-)

ANOTHER mistake.
What a week. Okay, Day 11 of a hellacious week.

I pasted the whole wrong thing before, and that will be a clue about what the 11 days have been about. I didn't mean to bring that here, and I'm sorry I did.



Colleen is probably laughing, I hope. :-) Here's the right, originally intended, happy and useful and proper link:
....

But today it was Colleen Prieto, and she's too far away for me to offer breakfast, so I've written this:
http://justaddlightandstir.blogspot.com/2013/08/colleen-prieto-in-overtime.html

Sandra




[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]

messages.subject: Just Add Light, and a mistake, and the morning
messages.msgSnippet: Greetings to my favorite unschooling resource ever. Okay, second favorite.  I still miss the first couple of years of Unschooling.com s long-gone message
messages.messageBody:
Greetings to my favorite unschooling resource ever.

Okay, second favorite. I still miss the first couple of years of Unschooling.com's long-gone message board.

Greetings to my favorite of the surviving unschooling resources, ever!

In post number 1,066 or so of Just Add Light, I botched a credit. I've miscredited photos twice before, but once it was Marty and once it was Holly, and all I had to do to make it better was to make a nice breakfast. They're not reading that blog anyway.

But today it was Colleen Prieto, and she's too far away for me to offer breakfast, so I've written this:

http://sandradodd.blogspot.com/2013/08/unpleasant-business-sorry.html

Good morning, where applicable, and have a nice day, rest of the world.

Sandra
